title: combine/merge account
body:
Can we have like option to merge/add multiple account into one?

i can even pay RP to combine multiple accounts into one riot.
this will give u more money i guarentee.

or like have limites to merge account like you do with refund tokens??

replies.body:
Since you're suggesting a feature rather than looking for help, I strongly recommend reposting this to the [**Miscellaneous Boards.**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous)

Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^
dont think it would give them money people could farm up free stuff like keys and chests on multiple accounts and then get it into one
would already be enough to merge 2 accounts. also would probably make stolen accounts a lot harder to recover if they get instantly merged
